00044         public static string Encrypt(string Input,string Key)
00045         {
00046             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input) || string.IsNullOrEmpty(Key))
00047             {
00048                 throw new ArgumentNullException("The input/key string can not be empty.");
00049             }
00050             try
00051             {
00052                 ASCIIEncoding Encoding = new ASCIIEncoding();
00053                 byte[] KeyHashArray = Encoding.GetBytes(Key);
00054                 byte[] KeyArray = new byte[8];
00055                 byte[] Key2Array = new byte[8];
00056                 SHA1CryptoServiceProvider SHA = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider();
00057                 byte[] Hash = SHA.ComputeHash(KeyHashArray);
00058                 SHA.Clear();
00059                 for (int x = 0; x < 8; ++x)
00060                 {
00061                     KeyArray[x] = Hash[x];
00062                     Key2Array[x] = Hash[x + 8];
00063                 }
00064                 byte[] Text = null;
00065                 DESCryptoServiceProvider Encryptor = new DESCryptoServiceProvider();
00066                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00067                 {
00068                     using (CryptoStream DESStream = new CryptoStream(Stream, Encryptor.CreateEncryptor(KeyArray, Key2Array), CryptoStreamMode.Write))
00069                     {
00070                         using (StreamWriter Writer = new StreamWriter(DESStream))
00071                         {
00072                             Writer.Write(Input);
00073                             Writer.Flush();
00074                             DESStream.FlushFinalBlock();
00075                             Writer.Flush();
00076                             Text = Stream.GetBuffer();
00077                         }
00078                     }
00079                 }
00080                 Encryptor.Clear();
00081                 return Convert.ToBase64String(Text, 0, (int)Text.Length);
00082             }
00083             catch { throw; }
00084         }

00092         public static string Decrypt(string Input,string Key)
00093         {
00094             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input) || string.IsNullOrEmpty(Key))
00095             {
00096                 throw new ArgumentNullException("The input/key string can not be empty.");
00097             }
00098             try
00099             {
00100                 ASCIIEncoding Encoding = new ASCIIEncoding();
00101                 byte[] KeyHashArray = Encoding.GetBytes(Key);
00102                 byte[] KeyArray = new byte[8];
00103                 byte[] Key2Array = new byte[8];
00104                 SHA1CryptoServiceProvider SHA = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider();
00105                 byte[] Hash = SHA.ComputeHash(KeyHashArray);
00106                 SHA.Clear();
00107                 for (int x = 0; x < 8; ++x)
00108                 {
00109                     KeyArray[x] = Hash[x];
00110                     Key2Array[x] = Hash[x + 8];
00111                 }
00112                 string Text = null;
00113                 DESCryptoServiceProvider Decryptor = new DESCryptoServiceProvider();
00114                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream(Convert.FromBase64String(Input)))
00115                 {
00116                     using (CryptoStream DESStream = new CryptoStream(Stream, Decryptor.CreateDecryptor(KeyArray, Key2Array), CryptoStreamMode.Read))
00117                     {
00118                         using (StreamReader Reader = new StreamReader(DESStream))
00119                         {
00120                             Text = Reader.ReadToEnd();
00121                         }
00122                     }
00123                 }
00124                 Decryptor.Clear();
00125                 return Text;
00126             }
00127             catch { throw; }
00128         }
